===============================================================

**Tender Reference:** W6399-23DB14/A
**Tender Title:** Acquisition of Small Uncrewed Ground Vehicles (UGVs)
---------------------------------------------------------

**Procurement Context**
--------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire a number of small Uncrewed Ground Vehicle (UGV) systems and related logistics support services.

**Requirements**
------------

-  Acquisition of multiple small UGV systems with various capabilities (payload, range, sensors)
-  Providing spare parts, training, technical and maintenance services, as required, for the UGV systems
-  Deliveries to take place across Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Period and Delivery Schedule**
----------------------------------------

The contract period for awarding contracts under the Supply Arrangement is from the date of issue to 31 December 2027. The supply of goods and services is expected to take place on an as-and-when-required basis.

**Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------

The evaluation will be based on the lowest price and will include a technical and financial evaluation in the subsequent Request for Proposal phase.

**Procedure for Bid Submittal**
-----------------------------

-  Suppliers are required to use the epost Connect service to submit their bids electronically
-  Documents may be submitted in either French or English

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Webster, Sean
Sean.webster@pwgsc.gc.ca
(873) 354-9545

**Document Availability**
-----------------------

The complete request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) is available for download from the Canada Buy Service (CBS) website. 

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

DND will issue a Request for Proposal (RFP) to qualified Supply Arrangement holders, to which a detailed Statement of Work (SOW) will be attached, specifying the exact dates, locations, tasks, and deliverables for service delivery, as well as other performance requirements.
